admin_module.description: Allows administration of SDP system. Includes user, group, role, permission, and module management.

requirements.REQ-ADM-USR-1: System supports creation, deletion, updating of users
requirements.REQ-ADM-USR-2: Each user associated with one group and one or more roles
requirements.REQ-ADM-USR-3: Password reset and account locking available

requirements.REQ-ADM-GRP-1: System supports creation, deletion, update of groups
requirements.REQ-ADM-GRP-2: Each group can have multiple roles attached

requirements.REQ-ADM-ROL-1: System supports creation, deletion, update of roles

requirements.REQ-ADM-PERM-1: Permissions created, deleted, updated by admin
requirements.REQ-ADM-PERM-2: Each permission is mapped to a module function

requirements.REQ-ADM-MOD-1: System supports creation, deletion, update of modules
requirements.REQ-ADM-MOD-2: Modules can be mapped to permissions
